pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bootstrap for Regression Effect Sizes // Generates nonparametric bootstrap confidence intervals (Efron and Tibshirani, 1993: doi:10.1201/9780429246593) for standardized regression coefficients (beta) and other effect sizes, including multiple correlation, semipartial correlations, improvement in R-squared, squared partial correlations, and differences in standardized regression coefficients, for models fitted by lm().
